programme.title: Lo'bat Hob
programme.desc: Sama tries hard not to mess up her tasks. Meanwhile, Farida plants spies in the company and Ramy ensures her plan goes smoothly.\r\n\r\n.(n)

programme.title: Sondos
programme.desc: When the Mabahith comes looking for Thamer, his siblings rally around him. But as Abdelrahman ignores their calls, the kids resort to Sondos.(n)

programme.title: Sondos
programme.desc: Sondos tries to get all the children out of trouble. Nouf’s neglect of Amal sparks conflict between Sondos and Rajeh. Manahil gets herself in a tough situation.(n)

programme.title: Sondos
programme.desc: Wajed makes a grave mistake on social media that Sondos uses to her advantage. Thamer helps Manahil with her presentation, but things quickly go south.(n)

programme.title: Sondos
programme.desc: Abdelrahman severely punishes Manahil and Thamer for their behaviour. Badr makes a dumb move and finds himself in urgent need of money. Mashael and Farhan get in a fight.(n)

programme.title: Sondos
programme.desc: Rashed tries to win Rima back. Thamer manages to sell a video game he designed, but faces obstacles opening a bank account due to his age.(n)

programme.title: El Maddah: Ostouret El Awda
programme.desc: Saber heads to Aswan after a family asks for his help, but the trip doesn't go as planned…\r\n\r\n.(n)

programme.title: El Maddah: Ostouret El Awda
programme.desc: While Saber's story goes viral on social media, Hassan refuses to comply with his orders. Upon visiting her father’s grave, Rehab’s suspicion about Saber grows.(n)

programme.title: El Maddah: Ostouret El Awda
programme.desc: Saber visits The Catacomb in search of answers. Aisha's night ends with tragedy when a sinister guest knocks on her door.(n)

programme.title: El Maddah: Ostouret El Awda
programme.desc: Manal and Kassia meet while attending a religious lecture taught by Sameeh. Saber saves Daood. Sameeh brings Gameel and Omayma to his side.(n)

programme.title: El Maddah: Ostouret El Awda
programme.desc: While Rehab consults Sameeh about her relationship with Saber, Manal suggests she return to her father's. Saber discovers something heartbreaking upon visiting Aisha.(n)

programme.title: Mahkum
programme.desc: Murad suspects that Mona took Bassel in after his injury, and goes to search her house intending to get his revenge.(n)

programme.title: Mahkum
programme.desc: Murad kidnaps Bassel and starts threatening him to get him to give up the location of the gang’s hideout. Deema doesn’t agree with Murad’s methods.(n)

programme.desc: Mariam tries to hide from Tamara what was really stolen from the safe. Elsewhere, Hussain breaks his agreement with Yousef.(n)

programme.desc: Tamara is furious with Mariam after learning of her marriage to Aziz’s enemy. Meanwhile, Farida seeks Majdi’s help in dealing with Yousef’s cruelty.(n)
